__e: What Dr Muller means, Richard, is that Alec shows no desire to get well.
Until Alec changes things, I'm tellin' the boys what to do.
If you and Alec don't get married, I don't know who should.
All you can possibly get from Alec is money.
Why, everything Alec is now, he owes to her.
But I always say, Sir Alec is the voice of reason on the Tory side.
I stared out of that railway carriage window into the dark... and watched the dim trees and the telegraph posts slipping by... and through them, I saw Alec and me.
Alec and me - perhaps a little younger than we are now, but just as much in love... and with nothing in the way.
Alec and me talked that over.
